sourcesContent:
<!-- medicament-form.page.html -->

<ion-header>
    <ion-toolbar>
    
    <ion-title>Ajouter un Médicament</ion-title>
    </ion-toolbar>
    </ion-header>
    
    <ion-content [fullscreen]="true">
    
    
    
    <form>
      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Nom du Médicament</ion-label>
        <ion-input [(ngModel)]="nom" name="nom" type="text" required [ngModelOptions]="{standalone: true}"></ion-input>
      </ion-item>
    
      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Dosage</ion-label>
        <ion-input [(ngModel)]="dosage" name="dosage" [ngModelOptions]="{standalone: true}" type="number" required></ion-input>
      </ion-item>
    
    
        <ion-item>
          <ion-label>Fréquence</ion-label>
          <ion-checkbox [(ngModel)]="prises[0].checked" [ngModelOptions]="{standalone: true}"></ion-checkbox>
          <ion-label>Matin</ion-label>
          <ion-checkbox [(ngModel)]="prises[1].checked" [ngModelOptions]="{standalone: true}"></ion-checkbox>
          <ion-label>Midi</ion-label>
          <ion-checkbox [(ngModel)]="prises[2].checked" [ngModelOptions]="{standalone: true}"></ion-checkbox>
          <ion-label>Soir</ion-label>
        </ion-item>
        
    
    
      <ion-button type="submit" expand="full" (click)="addMedicament()" >Ajouter</ion-button>
    </form>
    
    </ion-content>
